Texts.Chs: 把它挂挂挂在建筑物的墙壁上，让这里成为某某人的新家！
Texts.Eng: Ssscreen for houssse wall. Makesss sssilly fire lizardsss come.

Texts.Chs: 放置在一个至少有着一扇门和光源的封闭建筑中，然后看着人们搬进来吧！
Texts.Eng: With a colony deed an someone'll move into the building. Just make sure the building has a door an' a light source.

Texts.Chs: ^yellow;厄休安龙人样式殖民地契约
